record.dc:title: 82HY5 Thompson Village Site 7HY5, Henry County, Tennessee. Burial pit in profile, and beigaben that lay in the pit. Group of large flint blades. Direction north.
record.wpa:narrative: [Burial 121] This pit, because of the artifacts and the proximity of similar pits containing burials, was assumed to be a burial pit, in which all traces of bone had been decayed. Photo 82HY5 shows pit and profile.
record.wpa:comments: Additional field specimen numbers: all numbers from 2382 up to 2410. Observer illustration on file at the institution.
